name: Confused
description: You can't tell friend from foe. They all look the same to you!
resist: Roll Insight at the start of the afflicted's turn. After 6 successes, they snap out of it.
effect: When confused, select a move and target, then roll a single dice. On a success (4+) the move hits as normal. On a fail, select a random target beside your original target, including allies and yourself. Damage dealt while confused is halved, rounded up.
duration: Automatically snaps out of it after 4 turns.
